title: His Forever
description: Erin and Ibor are destined to be together forever but a vengeful dragon threatens to keep them apart. Fate once again has united them and this time they are ready to do whatever is necessary to stay that way. A story of love that transcends time, set in a unique world full of beauty, wonder and dangers.  Ibor - He didn't think he would find her again in this life time... but here she was... maddeningly beautiful and alluring filling all his senses until he had to have her again.  Erin - The surprise of finding her life mate was enough to knock her of balance. But finding Ibor, Chief of the Dragon Talon Clan was beyond anything or anyone she had ever imaged. Every look, every smile and caress just pulled her in further into a world she was not quite ready for.
author: Dalba Y. Castrillon
